title: Conjure Woodland Beings
content:
Conjure Woodland Being Level 4 Conjuration Spell Conjure a dryad to fight alongside you. She can use Nature's Step, Entangle enemies, and Summon a wood woad. 18m Action Level 4 Spell Slot

Conjure Woodland Being

Level 4 Conjuration Spell

Conjure a dryad to fight alongside you. She can use Nature's Step, Entangle enemies, and Summon a wood woad.

Conjure Woodland Beings is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Conjure Woodland Beings is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Conjure Woodland Beings Information

Description: Conjure a dryad to fight alongside you. She can use Nature's Step, Entangle enemies, and Summon a wood woad. Level: Lvl 4 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: No

Conjure a dryad to fight alongside you. She can use Nature's Step, Entangle enemies, and Summon a wood woad.

Conjure Woodland Beings stats

Str 10, Dex 14, Con 11, Int 14, Wis 15, Cha 18

Hit Points: 22, Armour Class: 13

Twisted Oak Crook: Make a melee attack, dealing 3d6 + Strength Modifier Bludgeoning damage.

Strengthened Shillelagh: Your staff or club becomes magical: it deals 4d8 Bludgeoning damage and uses yours Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls

Entangle: Create a vine surface, slowing down creatures, possibly Entangling them.

Fallen Lover: Summon a wood woad bound to your tree to fight alongside you.

Spike Growth: Shape a piece of ground into hard spikes. Movement is halfed. A creature walking on the spikes takes 2d4 Piercing damage for every 1.5m / 5ft it moves.

Grasp of the Forest: Weapon attacks can Entangle the target.

Magic Resistance: Has Advantage on Saving Throws against spells and other magical effects.

Nature's Step: You and your nearby allies aren't affected by Difficult Terrain, can't be Restrained or Paralysed, and gain Resistance to Poison damage.

Permanently Armed: Creature can't be disarmed.

Str 16, Dex 12, Con 16, Int 10, Wis 13, Cha 8

Hit Points: 42, Armour Class: 18

Twisting Branch: Make a melee attack, dealing 1d4 + Strength Modifier Bludgeoning damage.

Entangle: Create a vine surface, slowing down creatures, possibly Entangling them.

How to Acquire Conjure Woodland Beings

Conjure Woodland Beings can be acquired by the following classes: Druid, Ranger Conjure Woodland Beings can be cast by using the following Items: ???
